analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x8c1f4f358794b59fe12f06486fe884d436935120.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x8c1f4f358794b59fe12f06486fe884d436935120.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x8c1f4f358794b59fe12f06486fe884d436935120.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
